sentence.Network_en: Part two is about the slow development of stare decisis.
sentence.Network_cn: 十九世纪之前遵循先例原则的缓慢发展时期.

sentence.Network_en: So Stare Decisis has a powerful, forward looking momentum.
sentence.Network_cn: 因而,遵循先例有一种无力的, 向前看的动力.

sentence.Network_en: Part one introduces the rule of stare decisis and its philosophical basis.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文主要分为五个部分:第一部分:遵循先例的规则及哲学基础.

list.abs: 根据遵循先例 (stare decisis) 的原则，普通法继续发展和适用于香港，但当然是受《基本法》、成文法规和本地情况所限制。本席先前 …
遵循先例原则（stare decisis）是判例法制度的一个基本原则，是判例法的基　　础。
判例拘束力原则（the doctrine of stare decisis），是指对某一个案件的法律问题一旦获得解决，经由个案找出具有一般性拘束力的规 …

auth_sentence.content: He does not believe in stare decisis period.
auth_sentence.res_content: He does not believe in stare decisis period.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He does not believe in stare decisis period.

auth_sentence.content: He questioned every premise of Kennedy's opinion, starting with its contempt for stare decisis, the rule of precedent.
